name: FullArmor
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Full Armor was created to share more than just a verse, but rather, a passage that is 1 to 2 minutes long. We believe that this better puts truth into context to fully understand God's Word.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
